Class Settings

Settings used to control the behaviour of CrystalCore, such as turning on debug mode or enabling gameObject tracking

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

DebugMode

Whether Debug Mode is enabled or not. If it's enabled, things such as collision box visualization will also be enabled

Declaration
public static bool DebugMode { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean
| Improve this Doc View Source

GMTracking

Whether GameObject Tracking is enabled or not. If enabled, the will also be enabled, but can cause the game to run slower, so use this only for debugging purposes

Declaration
public static bool GMTracking { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean
Remarks

This must be enabled for DebugMode to work.
